nodes.excerpt: Weet is a video messaging tool that allows you to have asynchronous conversations with your team, partners, and customers. Weet includes instant recording, screen sharing, virtual background, video filters, emoji reactions, and rich comment options.
nodes.title: Weet - Asynchronous video communication for remote teams
nodes.author: Matthew Howells-Barby

localize.description: Weet是一个视频消息工具，它允许您与您的团队、合作伙伴和客户进行异步对话。Weet包括即时录音、屏幕共享、虚拟背景、视频过滤器、表情符号反应和丰富的评论选项。
localize.tagline: 远程团队的异步视频通信

localize.description: Weet是一個視頻消息工具，它允許您與您的團隊、合作伙伴和客戶進行異步對話。Weet包括即時錄音、屏幕共享、虛擬背景、視頻過濾器、表情符號反應和豐富的評論選項。
localize.tagline: 遠程團隊的異步視頻通信

nodes.excerpt: Every time we switch context, it takes us way longer to finish a task at hand. Aerotime creates space for deep work by stacking your meetings together & enables you to prioritize your most important tasks, in flow. Done across team, it saves even more hours.
nodes.title: Aerotime - Group meetings together and find time for deep work
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: 每当我们切换上下文时，都会花费更多的时间来完成手头的任务。Aerotime通过将您的会议堆叠在一起，为深度工作创造空间，并使您能够在流程中优先处理最重要的任务。跨团队完成，可以节省更多的时间。
localize.tagline: 小组会议一起，找时间深入工作

localize.description: 每當我們切換上下文時，都會花費更多的時間來完成手頭的任務。Aerotime通過將您的會議堆疊在一起，爲深度工作創造空間，並使您能夠在流程中優先處理最重要的任務。跨團隊完成，可以節省更多的時間。
localize.tagline: 小組會議一起，找時間深入工作

nodes.excerpt: 🖼Browse 50+ templates — pitch decks, sales proposals, briefs, & more 💡Get inspired by stunning decks built to enhance collaboration 🎨Instantly apply different design styles to any slide 💬Easily customize templates to match your brand 👉 https://pitch.com/templates
nodes.title: Presentation templates by Pitch - Designed for big ideas and customizable for any story
nodes.author: Julie Chabin

localize.description: 🖼浏览50多个模板--推介会、销售建议、简报等 💡从为增强协作而构建的令人惊叹的幻灯片中获得灵感 🎨立即将不同的设计风格应用到任何幻灯片中 💬轻松定制模板以匹配您的品牌 👉 https://pitch.com/templates
localize.tagline: 专为大创意而设计，并可为任何故事定制。

localize.description: 🖼瀏覽50多個模板--推介會、銷售建議、簡報等 💡從爲增強協作而構建的令人驚歎的幻燈片中獲得靈感 🎨立即將不同的設計風格應用到任何幻燈片中 💬輕鬆定製模板以匹配您的品牌 👉 https://pitch.com/templates
localize.tagline: 專爲大創意而設計，並可爲任何故事定製。

nodes.excerpt: We're the #1 weekend co-working club for bootstrappers to stay motivated, get helpful feedback and ship your project faster. Live sessions Saturdays 10am-5pm GMT & US Central time with a dedicated host, run over Slack & Zoom. Plus 100+ software discounts. 🤯
nodes.title: Weekend Club - The weekend co-working club for bootstrappers to ship faster
nodes.author: Charlie Ward

localize.description: 我们是引导者的第一周末联合办公俱乐部，让你保持积极性，得到有用的反馈，更快地完成项目。每周六格林威治标准时间和美国中部时间上午10点到下午5点，由专门的主持人通过Slack和Zoom进行实时会话。加上100+软件折扣。🤯
localize.tagline: 周末联合办公俱乐部，让引导者更快地出货。

localize.description: 我們是引導者的第一週末聯合辦公俱樂部，讓你保持積極性，得到有用的反饋，更快地完成項目。每週六格林威治標準時間和美國中部時間上午10點到下午5點，由專門的主持人通過Slack和Zoom進行實時會話。加上100+軟件折扣。🤯
localize.tagline: 週末聯合辦公俱樂部，讓引導者更快地出貨。

nodes.excerpt: Product management can seem like a daunting discipline, but once you get a grasp of the fundamentals, and combine that with some intuition, you’ll be on your way to leading successful projects.
nodes.title: Product Manager's Guide - A product manager guide from product vision to product road
nodes.author: @Being Pavan Kumar

localize.description: 产品管理似乎是一门令人望而生畏的学科，但一旦你掌握了基本原理，再结合一些直觉，你就会走上成功领导项目的道路。
localize.tagline: 从产品愿景到产品之路的产品经理指南。

nodes.excerpt: tw-rl is an advanced bookmarking and curation tool for twitter. Once connected, easily showcase tweet media or "loop" threads together. Use cases: portfolio, blog, mood board, inspiration gallery.

nodes.excerpt: Upgrade Zoom with a bluetooth connected keypad that lets you run Zoom with the click of a button. Video calls are easier with your twenty-two favorite Zoom shortcuts on one amazing hotkey pad. Available for both Windows and Mac.
nodes.title: Zapp Pad - Say goodbye to Zoom fails and communicate with confidence
nodes.author: Joe Martin

localize.description: 升级的Zoom与蓝牙连接的键盘，让你运行Zoom与点击一个按钮。视频通话更容易与你最喜欢的22个Zoom快捷键在一个惊人的热键板。适用于Windows和Mac。
localize.tagline: 告别Zoom失败，自信沟通。

localize.description: 升級的Zoom與藍牙連接的鍵盤，讓你運行Zoom與點擊一個按鈕。視頻通話更容易與你最喜歡的22個Zoom快捷鍵在一個驚人的熱鍵板。適用於Windows和Mac。
localize.tagline: 告別Zoom失敗，自信溝通。

nodes.excerpt: Track important tasks and projects, create upcoming events, keep notes and control expenses in one notion table. You can quickly find your to-do list or see how much money you spent last week.
nodes.title: Magic Board for Notion - Organize your entire life with one board
nodes.author: Damir Bektilov

nodes.excerpt: Tweet Peep 👀 gives you instant, one-click access to what other people are saying about the articles and videos you're browsing. It shortens the great-minds-think-alike process. Let's peep other people’s thoughts on media across Twitter!
nodes.title: Tweet Peep - Peep other people’s thoughts on media across Twitter
nodes.author: Kazuki Nakayasiki

localize.description: Tweet Peep 👀 让您可以一键访问其他人对您正在浏览的文章和视频的评价。它缩短了伟大的头脑--想法--相似的过程。让我们在Twitter上偷看别人对媒体的看法吧!
localize.tagline: 在Twitter上窥视其他人对媒体的想法。

localize.description: Tweet Peep 👀 讓您可以一鍵訪問其他人對您正在瀏覽的文章和視頻的評價。它縮短了偉大的頭腦--想法--相似的過程。讓我們在Twitter上偷看別人對媒體的看法吧!
localize.tagline: 在Twitter上窺視其他人對媒體的想法。

nodes.excerpt: Enombic is a product for designing your own custom stock indexes, investing in them, and sharing them with your friends. Remix the ARK ETFs, market-cap weight the WSB symbols, or "fork" SPY and set your own custom weights. Then, it's one click to invest!
nodes.title: Enombic - Create your own stock indexes
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Enombic是一款用于设计自己的自定义股指，投资股指，并与朋友分享的产品。重新组合ARK ETF，市值加权WSB符号，或 "分叉 "SPY并设置您自己的自定义权重。然后，就可以一键投资了!
localize.tagline: 创建自己的股票指数

localize.description: Enombic是一款用於設計自己的自定義股指，投資股指，並與朋友分享的產品。重新組合ARK ETF，市值加權WSB符號，或 "分叉 "SPY並設置您自己的自定義權重。然後，就可以一鍵投資了!
localize.tagline: 創建自己的股票指數
